location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly to Captain Arthur William Roberts

mods.abstract: Letter informing him that his duties in relation to the transit of His Excellency to Bhurtpore [Bharatpur] will commence at Futtehpoor Sikrie [Fatehpur Sīkri] and that arrangements should be made for the party to travel through Deyg [Dīg] and Muthra [Mathura].The letter also requests that a translation of the programme should be provided by the Political Agent to the Maharajah (of Bharatpur?).
